channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiOS, FortiProxy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiOS, FortiProxy

item.title: CVE-2018-13379|2024-10-23T13:32:35.204Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortios%2C%20fortiproxy
item.description: An Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ("Path Traversal") in Fortinet FortiOS 6.0.0 to 6.0.4, 5.6.3 to 5.6.7 and 5.4.6 to 5.4.12 and FortiProxy 2.0.0, 1.2.0 to 1.2.8, 1.1.0 to 1.1.6, 1.0.0 to 1.0.7 under SSL VPN web portal allows an unauthenticated attacker to download system files via special crafted HTTP resource requests.

item.title: CVE-2018-13382|2024-10-23T13:31:37.705Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortios%2C%20fortiproxy
item.description: An Improper Authorization vulnerability in Fortinet FortiOS 6.0.0 to 6.0.4, 5.6.0 to 5.6.8 and 5.4.1 to 5.4.10 and FortiProxy 2.0.0, 1.2.0 to 1.2.8, 1.1.0 to 1.1.6, 1.0.0 to 1.0.7 under SSL VPN web portal allows an unauthenticated attacker to modify the password of an SSL VPN web portal user via specially crafted HTTP requests
